dateOfBirthTitle: What is their date of birth?
dateOfBirthWarningText: If you provide an incorrect date of birth, they will not be able to connect their verified identity to the information we hold.
confirmCorrectDateOfBirthHeading: Check and confirm you've entered the correct date
confirmCorrectDateOfBirthEntered: I confirm I have entered the correct date of birth for
error-invalid: The date must be a real date
error-dateInFuture: Date must be today or in the past
error-noDayMonth: Date of birth must include a day and a month
error-noDayYear: Date of birth must include a day and a year
error-noMonthYear: Date of birth must include a month and a year
error-noDay: Date of birth must include a day
error-noMonth: Date of birth must include a month
error-noYear: Date of birth must include a year
error-tooOld: They must be less than 110 years old
error-tooYoung: They must be at least 16 years old
error-nonNumeric: Date of birth must only include numbers
error-notConfirmed: Select to confirm the date of birth
